meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being like a dog.
meanings.sent1: Her love for playing fetch and wagging tail showed her true dogginess.
meanings.sent2: The dogginess of his loyalty and friendly nature made him everyone's favorite.
meanings.sent3: His dogginess was so evident when he chased his own shadow thinking it was a squirrel.
meanings.sent4: The dogginess in her personality shone through as she greeted everyone with a big smile.
meanings.sent5: The dogginess of the puppy was so infectious, it made everyone around happy.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of having the qualities or characteristics of a dog.
meanings.sent1: The shelter was filled with the dogginess of barking, wagging tails, and wet noses.
meanings.sent2: His transformation into a dogginess after spending so much time with his pet was remarkable.
meanings.sent3: The dogginess of the situation was evident when they all started howling at the moon.
meanings.sent4: She embraced her inner dogginess and started enjoying long walks and belly rubs.
meanings.sent5: The dogginess of the park was so inviting, it felt like a canine paradise.
